statements: UPDATE trade_surveillance_activities SET trade_amount = 1500.00, market_regulations_complied = TRUE WHERE trade_id = 12345 AND trader_id = 54321
UPDATE trade_surveillance_activities SET trade_timestamp = '2022-10-15 08:30:00', trade_amount = 2000.50 WHERE trader_id = 54321 AND trade_id = 67890
UPDATE trade_surveillance_activities SET trade_amount = 1500.50, market_regulations_complied = TRUE WHERE trade_id = 100 AND trader_id = 200;
UPDATE trade_surveillance_activities SET trade_timestamp = '2022-06-30 15:45:30', trade_amount = 2500.75 WHERE trade_id = 150 AND trader_id = 250;
UPDATE trade_surveillance_activities SET trader_name='John Doe', trade_amount=500.00 WHERE trade_id=1001;
UPDATE market_regulations SET compliance_status=true, regulation_description='New regulations implemented' WHERE regulation_id=1;
UPDATE trade_surveillance_activities SET trade_amount = 5000.50, trader_name = 'John Doe' WHERE trade_id = 12345
UPDATE market_regulations SET compliance_status = TRUE, regulation_name = 'SEC Rule 17a-4', regulation_description = 'Regulation to preserve records of transactions' WHERE regulation_id = 10
UPDATE Trade_Surveillance SET trade_volume = 500 WHERE trade_id = 101
UPDATE Surveillance_Logs SET log_message = 'Potential market manipulation detected' WHERE log_id = 201
UPDATE Trade_Surveillance SET trade_volume = 500, trade_symbol = 'AAPL' WHERE trade_id = 100;
UPDATE Surveillance_Logs SET log_message = 'Trade volume updated to 500, symbol changed to AAPL' WHERE trade_id = 100 AND trader_id = 200;
UPDATE trade_activities SET trade_quantity = 200 WHERE trade_id = 1001;
UPDATE surveillance_alerts SET alert_type = 'Risk' WHERE alert_id = 5001;
UPDATE trade_activities SET trade_date = '2022-08-05', traded_symbol = 'AAPL' WHERE trade_id = 101;
UPDATE surveillance_alerts SET alert_date = '2022-09-15', alert_description = 'Potential insider trading activity detected' WHERE alert_id = 201;

UPDATE market_regulations SET regulation_description = 'New regulation rules' WHERE regulation_id = 5678;
UPDATE trade_surveillance_activities SET trade_volume = 5000, trade_price = 150.75 WHERE trade_id = 12345;
UPDATE compliance_officers SET officer_email = 'newemail@example.com', officer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE officer_id = 98765;
